panels.description:
- if not filtered, shows global percentage of anomalies
-if filtered by Node, shows % of anomalous indicators
panels.title: Percentage of Anomalous Nodes

panels.description: Count of anomaly scores greater than threshold

targets.expr: WITH(f={preset="node-exporter"}) count(count(min(anomaly_score{f}) without (model_alias,scheduler_alias)>=1.0) by (for)) by (for)/count(count by (for) (anomaly_score{f})) by (for)

panels.title: Anomalies per Indicator

panels.description: Number of anomalous indicators per node
panels.title: Numbers of Anomalous Indicators by Node

panels.description: Sudden spike of Node CPU seconds
panels.title: Anomalies: CPU Seconds: Mode $cpu_mode

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$node",job=~"$job", mode=~"$cpu_mode"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~"$node",job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.description: Sudden drop or spike of Read latency
panels.title: Anoamlies: Read Latency

panels.description: Sudden drop or spike of Write latency
panels.title: Anomalies: Write Latency

panels.description: Sudden drop or spike of Host Network Transmit Errors
panels.title: Anomalies: Host Network Transmit Errors

panels.description: Sudden drop or spike of Host Network Receive Errors
panels.title: Anomalies: Host Network Receive Errors
